sentences.sContent: That generates electricity and causes the metals to recombine in the electrolyte.
sentences.sContent_eng: That generates electricity and causes the metals to recombine in the electrolyte.
sentences.sCn: 这会产生电流并使金属在电解液中重新合成。

sentences.sContent: During charging, ions from the electrolyte accumulate on the surface of each carbon-coated plate.
sentences.sContent_eng: During charging, ions from the electrolyte accumulate on the surface of each carbon-coated plate.
sentences.sCn: 加载电荷后，电解液中的离子各自集聚在碳涂层板的表面。

phrases.pCn: 蓄电池电解质；电池电解液

words.tran: 电解的；电解质的；由电解产生的
[化学] 电解，[化学] 电解作用；以电针除痣

trans.tranOther: a liquid that allows electricity to pass through it
